sentence.text: The ADAMTS18 gene is often down-regulated by hypermethylation in ccRCC-derived cell lines and primary tumors, indicating its critical role as a negative regulation of cytokine production in ccRCC.

ADAMTS18, located at 16q23.1, has been reported to be a critical negative regulation of cytokine production in multiple primary tumors; however, this has not yet been verified in clear cell renal cell carcinoma (ccRCC).
To identify tumor suppressor genes (negative regulation of cytokine productions) silenced by hypermethylation and discover new epigenetic biomarkers for early cancer detection.
